channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-21794] Add materialized view parameters to sqlStdAuthSafeVarNameRegexes
item.description:
> set hive.materializedview.rewriting=false;
Error: Error while processing statement: Cannot modify hive.materializedview.rewriting at runtime. It is not in list of params that are allowed to be modified at runtime (state=42000,code=1)
item.summary: Add materialized view parameters to sqlStdAuthSafeVarNameRegexes

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
